categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ram Jomaram was a human male Jedi Padawan who lived in the Valo Temple, on the planet Valo, during the High Republic Era.
Jomaram had a big heart and favored being in a garage surrounded by tools, mechanical parts and Bonbraks.
Jomaram was a natural mechanic but his lightsaber technique was lacking.

Ram Jomaram was created for the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project. He debuted in the 2021 junior novel The High Republic: Race to Crashpoint Tower written by Daniel José Older. Concept art for Jomaram appeared on StarWars.com for the project's kickoff, though his name was misspelled as "Jamoram" in the reveal article.
